# The `VirtRegAuxInfo` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Calculate auxiliary information for a virtual register such as its spill weight and allocation hint. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::VirtRegAuxInfo</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Calculate auxiliary information for a virtual register such as its spill weight and allocation hint.

### weightCalcHelper() {#a137403167e291d2e011441ce02d51898}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>float VirtRegAuxInfo::weightCalcHelper (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &amp; LI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> &#42; Start=nullptr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> &#42; End=nullptr)</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
Helper function for weight calculations.

(Re)compute LI&#39;s spill weight and allocation hint, or, for non null start and end - compute future expected spill weight of a split artifact of LI that will span between start and end slot indexes. 
<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="LI">The live interval for which to compute the weight.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Start">The expected beginning of the split artifact. Instructions before start will not affect the weight. Relevant for weight calculation of future split artifact.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="End">The expected end of the split artifact. Instructions after end will not affect the weight. Relevant for weight calculation of future split artifact.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
The spill weight. Returns negative weight for unspillable LI.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/calcspillweights-h/#l00099">99</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/calcspillweights-h">CalcSpillWeights.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/calcspillweights-cpp/#l00160">160</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/calcspillweights-cpp">CalcSpillWeights.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
